text: According to reports, Ange ’ s new man – rapper and filmmaker praCh ly has been making secret visits to her Hollywood home, where he has bonded with the 42 year old ’ s son, Maddox and is even teaching the family about Buddism. “ Angelina and praCh have a special bond. They ’ re perfect for each other, ” an insider revealed to National Enquirer. A further source added, “ PraCh is a great role model for Maddox. He can teach him about his homeland of Cambodia in a way he can relate to. ” Angelina and praCh, second from left. “ That ’ s because both Maddox and praCh were born in Camodia, but didn ’ t grow up there. ” Ange and paCh
